name: RelaxingScreensavers
0:
”Alexa, open Relaxing Screensavers”
”Alexa, start Relaxing Screensavers”
”Alexa, launch Relaxing Screensavers”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: relaxing screensavers
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Display over 60 stunning video screensavers in ultra high definition video on your fire tv, echo show, or other Alexa display. 

Try using Alexa Routines to launch the Relaxing Screensavers skill automatically to enhance your daily routines!

For continuous uninterrupted playback, you may need to disable your default screensaver. Continuous playback requires the purchase of the premium expansion pack.

Ask Alexa to open Video Screensavers, then say "next" at anytime to move onto the next video screensaver. You have the option to unlock all screensavers with the Screensaver Expansion Pack, which includes all screensavers with continuous, uninterrupted playback, stunning visual playback in 4K and ultra high-definition video, and unlocked skill functionality across all of your Alexa enabled displays. 

Note: This skill requires a device capable of video playback in order to function properly. This skill will not work on devices that do not have a display. 

Please leave us a review if you are enjoying this skill!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
